text: George Shapiro (May 18, 1931 - May 26, 2022) was an American talent manager and television producer. He was the most successful managers in show business. He was best known for representing Jerry Seinfeld, Carl Reiner and Andy Kaufman. He was a producer for the sitcom Seinfeld. He was born in New York City. Shapiro died on May 26, 2022 at his home in Beverly Hills, California, eight days after his 91st birthday. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American television producers Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: George Shapiro
